alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 4:57PM EDT until March 26 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL MUSCOGEE AND CENTRAL CHATTAHOOCHEE COUNTIES... At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vista Terrace, or 3 miles east of downtown Columbus, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... North Fort Benning, Upatoi, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Highland Park, Sand Hill, Vista Terrace, Kenwood, Midland, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park and Flat Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
